sentences.english: There is a saying that every time the sheep bleats, it loses a mouthful of hay.
sentences.chinese: 有句古諺曾說，綿羊每叫一聲，它就會掉落一口乾草。

sentences.english: There's the old saying everyone's familiar with "a journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step."
sentences.chinese: “千里之行始於足下”這句古諺大家再熟悉不過了。

sentences.english: As the old saw has it, faint heart never won fair lady.
sentences.chinese: 正如古諺所說，軟弱的心無法贏得美人。

sentences.english: "The more articulate, the less say" is an old Chinese proverb which I just make up myself.
sentences.chinese: 者善辯“是我自己剛剛虛構的一句中國古諺。

sentences.english: In the words of the old African proverb, when you pray, move your feet.
sentences.chinese: 非洲古諺說，當你祈禱的時候，也同時採取行動。
